heading: TARGETED MUSCLES: Arm muscles. WHAT YOU NEED: Sturdy chair with armrests. This pushing motion will strengthen your arm muscles even if you are not able to lift yourself up off the chair.

steps.1: Sit in a sturdy chair with armrests with your feet flat on the floor, shoulder-width apart.
steps.2: Lean slightly forward; keep your back and shoulders straight.
steps.3: Grasp arms of chair with your hands next to you. Breathe in slowly.
steps.4: Breathe out and use your arms to push your body slowly off the chair.
steps.6: Breathe in as you slowly lower yourself back down.
